lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt said he was proud of his contribution in taking down the tennis giants on Thursday after his 20th and final appearance in the Australian Open singles came to a close.
snippet: Lleyton Hewitt said he was proud of his contribution in taking down the tennis giants on Thursday after his 20th and final appearance in the Australian Open singles came to a close....

headline.main: Hewitt Proud to Have Taken Game Forward, by Staying Back
headline.print_headline: Hewitt Proud to Have Taken Game Forward, by Staying Back
